title: Fingerprint hardware Not Available
content: Restarted Pixel 3 XL multiple times. Cleaned sensor. Added another set of prints. This issue flares up once in a while but definitely more often in the last two weeks. Unlocking the phone is not the worst inconvenience; it's the fact that literally every second app on my phone uses this feature to log into various accounts. This is a huge inconvenience in need of immediate fixing!
